header: IIReinforcement learning framework for weight reduction

images.caption: Figure 3:Parallel coordinates plot comparing hypergraph product base codes (blue) and RL-optimized codes (red) after weight reduction. For each color, 475 codes(including 10 high-distance ones beyond the HGP-30 regime)with varying parameters are shown. Each vertical axis is normalized to the maximum observed value for that parameter, and each line traces a single codeâ€™s parameters across all axes.
